languages.text: {n}Каллигос разражается оглушительным смехом.{/n} "Надо же, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}! Даже твой ручной ксенос чует, кто из нас маститее в резне! Друкари, значит... может, я бы и сменил змеюку на долговязого — сслит мне уже порядком надоел, ничем не удивляет. А вы, я знаю, мастера играть с добычей..."

{n}Calligos roars with deafening laughter.{/n} "Why, new blood, even your pet xenos knows which of us dominates in the art of slaughter! A Drukhari... Thinking about it, I would exchange the snake for your gangly pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise is left in that thing. But your kind, as I know well, are masters at playing with prey..."
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос разражается оглушительным смехом.{/n} "Надо же, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}! Даже твой ручной ксенос чует, кто из нас маститее в резне! Друкари, значит... может, я бы и сменил змеюку на долговязого — сслит мне уже порядком надоел, ничем не удивляет. А вы, я знаю, мастера играть с добычей..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos roars with deafening laughter.{/n} "Come now, new blood! Even your pet xenos knows which of us dominates in the art of slaughter! A Drukhari... Thinking on it, I'd exchange the snake for your lanky pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise left in him. And you, I understand, are masters at playing with prey..."

{n}Calligos roars with deafening laughter.{/n} "Come now, new blood! Even your pet xenos knows which of us dominates in the art of slaughter! A Drukhari... Thinking on it, I'd exchange the snake for your lanky pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise left in him. And you, I understand, are masters at playing with prey..."

Thinking about it, I'd exchange the snake for your lanky pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise is left in him. And you, I understand, are masters at playing with prey..."

Thinking about it, I would exchange the snake for your gangly pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise is left in that thing. But your kind, as I know well, are masters at playing with prey..."

{n}Calligos roars with deafening laughter.{/n} "Why, new blood, even your pet xenos knows which of us dominates in the art of slaughter! A Drukhari... Thinking about it, I would exchange the snake for your gangly pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise is left in that thing. But your kind, as I know well, are masters at playing with prey..."

languages.text: {n}Calligos profiere una estruendosa carcajada.{/n} «¡Vaya, {mf|novato|novata}! ¡Hasta su mascota xenos tiene claro cuál de los dos ha dominado el arte de la matanza! Un Drukhari... Ahora que lo pienso, me gustaría cambiarle a la serpiente por su esmirriada mascota. El Sslyth me aburre soberanamente; nada de lo que hace me sorprende ya. Y los de tu especie juegan magistralmente con sus presas. Lo digo por experiencia...».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos roars with deafening laughter.{/n} "Why, new blood, even your pet xenos knows which of us dominates in the art of slaughter! A Drukhari... Thinking about it, I would exchange the snake for your gangly pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise is left in that thing. But your kind, as I know well, are masters at playing with prey..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos profiere una estruendosa carcajada.{/n} «¡Venga ya, {mf|novato|novata}! ¡Hasta su mascota xenos tiene claro cuál de los dos ha dominado el arte de la matanza! Un Drukhari... Ahora que lo pienso, me gustaría cambiarle a la serpiente por su esmirriada mascota. El sslyth me aburre soberanamente; nada de lo que hace me sorprende ya. Y los de tu especie, según tengo entendido, juegan magistralmente con sus presas...».

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯发出震耳欲聋的大笑声。{/n}“看看吧，新来的！咱们俩谁才是杀戮艺术的主宰，就连你的宠物异形都看得出来！黑暗灵族……仔细想想，我可以用那条蛇来换你的宠物麻杆。我真是烦透了这只蛇人，这玩意儿给不了我一丁点惊喜。至于你们，我知道你们黑暗灵族都是玩弄猎物的高手……”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos roars with deafening laughter.{/n} "Why, new blood, even your pet xenos knows which of us dominates in the art of slaughter! A Drukhari... Thinking about it, I would exchange the snake for your gangly pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise is left in that thing. But your kind, as I know well, are masters at playing with prey..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯发出震耳欲聋的大笑声。{/n}“来吧，新来的！咱们俩谁才是杀戮艺术的主宰，就连你的宠物异形都看得出来！黑暗灵族……仔细想想，我可以用那条蛇来换你的宠物麻杆。我真是烦透了这只蛇人，他身上一丁点惊喜都没有。但我知道，你们黑暗灵族都是玩弄猎物的高手……”

languages.text: {n}Calligos éclate d'un rire tonitruant.{/n} « Allons, novice ! Même votre xénos de compagnie a compris qui de nous deux est le plus versé dans l'art du massacre ! Un Drukhari... Maintenant que j'y pense, j'échangerais volontiers ce serpent contre votre grand dadais. Ce Sslyth m'ennuie terriblement et n'arrive plus à me surprendre, mais les xénos comme celui-ci sont passés maîtres dans l'art de jouer avec leurs proies... »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos roars with deafening laughter.{/n} "Why, new blood, even your pet xenos knows which of us dominates in the art of slaughter! A Drukhari... Thinking about it, I would exchange the snake for your gangly pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise is left in that thing. But your kind, as I know well, are masters at playing with prey..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos éclate d'un rire tonitruant.{/n} « Allons, novice ! Même votre xénos de compagnie a compris qui de nous deux est le plus versé dans l'art du massacre ! Un Drukhari... Maintenant que j'y pense, j'échangerais volontiers ce serpent contre votre grand dadais. Ce Sslyth m'ennuie terriblement, il n'arrive plus à me surprendre, mais les xénos comme vous sont passés maîtres dans l'art de jouer avec leurs proies... »

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは耳をつんざくような笑い声を上げる。{/n}「さあ、新米よ！お前のペットの異種族ですら、俺たちのどちらが殺戮術に優れているか知っている！デュカーリか…そうだな、蛇とお前の小柄なペットを交換するのはどうだ。ススリスは私をひどく退屈させる。まったく驚かされることがない。だが、お前らは獲物をもてあそぶ名人なんだろ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos roars with deafening laughter.{/n} "Why, new blood, even your pet xenos knows which of us dominates in the art of slaughter! A Drukhari... Thinking about it, I would exchange the snake for your gangly pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise is left in that thing. But your kind, as I know well, are masters at playing with prey..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスは耳をつんざくような笑い声を上げる。{/n}「さあ、新米よ！お前のペットの異種族ですら、俺たちのどちらが殺戮術に優れているか知っている！デュカーリか…そうだな、蛇とお前の小柄なペットを交換するのはどうだ。ススリスは私をひどく退屈させる。まったく驚かされることがない。だが、お前らは獲物をもてあそぶ名人なんだろ？」

languages.text: {n}Calligos brüllt vor Lachen.{/n} "Selbst Euer zahmer Xenos weiß, wer von uns beiden in der Kunst des Gemetzels dominiert! Ein Drukhari ... Wenn ich so darüber nachdenke, würde ich die Schlange gegen Euer schlaksiges Haustier eintauschen. Der Sslyth langweilt mich fürchterlich, es steckt keine einzige Überraschung mehr in dem Ding. Doch Euresgleichen, wie ich nur zu gut weiß, versteht es meisterhaft, mit Beute zu spielen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos roars with deafening laughter.{/n} "Why, new blood, even your pet xenos knows which of us dominates in the art of slaughter! A Drukhari... Thinking about it, I would exchange the snake for your gangly pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise is left in that thing. But your kind, as I know well, are masters at playing with prey..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos brüllt vor Lachen.{/n} "Kommt, neues Blut! Selbst Euer zahmer Xenos weiß, wer von uns beiden in der Kunst des Gemetzels dominiert! Ein Drukhari ... Wenn ich so darüber nachdenke, würde ich die Schlange gegen Euer hageres Haustier eintauschen. Der Sslyth langweilt mich fürchterlich, es steckt keine einzige Überraschung mehr in ihm. Und Ihr, so weit ich weiß, versteht es meisterhaft, mit Beute zu spielen ..."

languages.text: {n}Calligos, kulakları sağır eden bir kahkahayla kükrüyor.{/n} "Bak sen şu işe taze kan! Evcil zenon bile katliam sanatına hangimizin hükmettiğini biliyor. Bir Drukhari... Düşünsene, sırıktan hâllice hayvanın için yılanı verecektim. Sslyth beni sıkıntıdan öldürüyor, o şeyde sürpriz namına bir şey kalmamış. Ancak senin türün, gayet iyi bildiğim üzere avıyla oynamada uzmandır..."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos roars with deafening laughter.{/n} "Why, new blood, even your pet xenos knows which of us dominates in the art of slaughter! A Drukhari... Thinking about it, I would exchange the snake for your gangly pet. The Sslyth bores me terribly, not a single surprise is left in that thing. But your kind, as I know well, are masters at playing with prey..."
